document_data.name: Ship Kurth
document_data.mainbody: '''Ship Kurth''' was one of the five factions of [[Luskan]] ruled by a [[High Captains (Luskan)|High Captain]]. It was named for and originally led by High Captain [[Kurth]].
document_data.Activities: By the 1480s [[DR]], Ship Kurth operated a tavern on the northern bank of the city called [[One-Eyed Jax]]. The tavern was well known for providing foreigners a good place to sleep, but it was also frequented by [[drow]]. High Captain [[Beniago|Beniago Kurth]] frequently posted caravan notices on a board in the tavern.
document_data.Base of Operations: Ship Kurth's base, known as [[Kurth Tower]], was located on [[Closeguard Island]], connected to the southwest part of the city by [[Dark Arch|a bridge]]. The island was located on the way to the [[Host Tower of the Arcane]] on [[Cutlass Island]].
document_data.Relationships: After (or rather, in fact, during) Lord [[Brambleberry]] and Captain [[Deudermont]]'s assault on Luskan in the {{YearlinkName|1376}}, Ship Kurth became the public face of the drow mercenary band [[Bregan D'aerthe]], lead by [[Jarlaxle]] and [[Kimmuriel Oblodra]].
document_data.History: Ship Kurth was originally founded by High Captain Kurth. In the 1400s, [[Beniago]], a [[drow]] agent of Bregan D'aerthe, infiltrated the Ship and became a lieutenant. By [[1484 DR]], he had become the High Captain.
document_data.Members:
* [[Kurth]], hot-tempered leader ''circa'' [[1361 DR]].
* [[Beniago|Beniago Kurth]], leader ''circa'' [[1484 DR]] and disguised drow agent of Bregan D'aerthe.
